text: Terrifier is a 2016 American independent slasher movie written and directed by Damien Leone. The movie stars Jenna Kanell, Samantha Scaffidi, David Howard Thornton, and Catherine Corcoran. The movie is about Tara Heyes (Kanell) and her sister Victoria (Scaffidi), who were coming back from a party and soon become targets of the clown-like serial killer Art the Clown (Thornton) on Halloween night. The movie had mixed reviews, however it quickly became a cult movie. A sequel, Terrifier 2, was released on February 24, 2023. ==References== Category:2016 horror movies Category:American independent movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by Damien Leone
title: Terrifier
